commit.message:
[SYNCOPE-281]
Fixed all maven dependencies according to: "mvn dependency:analyse"


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk@1436349 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
